name: OldSchoolRacing
description:
This is my first racing game.

Now is in development on very early stage, and I believe that this game will release.

Controls: 

Keyboard: gas - w, reverse - s, steering - a/d, back to menu - backspace, turn back - v, handbrake - space

Gamepad: gas - rt, reverse - lt, steering - left joystick, turn back - y, handbrake - a
